issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: I have a separate nightly job that runs this on multiple R versions, but it would be nice to be able to have crossbow check this on a PR. As it turns out, the ARROW_S3 feature doesn't work with autobrew in practice--aws-sdk-cpp doesn't seem to ship static libs via Homebrew, so the autobrew packaging doesn't work, even though the formula builds and {{brew audit}} is clean.
fields.summary: [R][CI] Add crossbow job for full R autobrew macOS build
